title: [Bug]: Share screen quality doesn't work after latest update
body:
### Can you reproduce this bug in the website/PWA?

Not applicable

### Describe the bug

Prior to the newest update the quality selection when sharing a screen always worked, now with the newest update it no longer works, it will always be a blurry mess.

### What package are you using?

deb

### Version

2.0.17

### Reproduction steps

```markdown
1. Start a screen share and select '2K' or '4K'
2. The other people will only see a blurry mess
3.
...
```

### Expected Behavior

```markdown
1. Start a screen share and select '2K' or '4K'
2. The shared screen should be clearly visible
3.
...
```
